Post.title: Hello World！luofeng
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

title: Hello World！luofeng

Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: Reach Majhong魂天之路
Post._content:
## 逆风

### 开局点w8

| 牌谱链接                                                     | 终局顺位 | 当前段位        | rating | Matching          | 生成时间            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------------- | ------ | ----------------- | ------------------- |
| [极度逆风局](https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-0f4826e7-992f-4e94-9bb9-49667b6f5120_a10115437) | 3        | 雀豪3 1901/3600 | 90.779 | 132/177 = 74.576% | 2023-04-06 19:07:02 |

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTljZDllOTA2NjBjYmM1MjQyNTNhZTg3MDVjNjI3ZGRfaXRqT1U1TVhKb0F3bHk0Mk9uVDg2WGxzbDFPNms5TVlfVG9rZW46T0lNaWJMaVFEb0lua1l4djhDOGNNSDd3blFnXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

玩家：6m

AI：西

这里AI认为应该打西，确实应该打西，拆两个西后续还有兜牌的可能

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YTVlYTQ2ZmViNWU3NWE4MjBjZjYxZmUyNjg4ZGFlZjNfVWFnenFORzdyS25yTmdZdndkc0xlT1RCNHpIendpeVZfVG9rZW46Vmp0eGJMdXBnb0FiR1p4YW5pcmM4bzQ1bkt6XzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

这里我认为dora2想留着役牌快速听牌；但是AI可能觉得断幺九要更好一点，得反省一下，确实摸8p也同样可以碰听，断幺九会更优秀一点

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDllZmNlOWY2ODhkZjkyYTA5MTg4ODM5Y2M4MDRlMDlfZ3FtMWlaMVNRMmdCUDRTOER6aVN3bDhPMncxbzBuaTVfVG9rZW46WU5rU2JZSzc2b0ZjcEN4UDhmSmNncDZTbmplXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

这里AI同样重视断幺九，而且打掉4m亏了太多改良，就算后面听了形状也很差，打点也不高，所以打1s

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjNhMzBhNzFmNWZkNTZmY2YzODI0ZDA5MDdmNTJmOTJfcUZSWk1CVEFYUWMxT0hHd1J6NW9YNXg2SExkM1QyZVZfVG9rZW46VGNVSmJUdG1sbzVPQ294UnFYcGNVSWc1bjBnXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

切牌手顺问题，必打1s的情况！

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTY5ZWY4Y2NkMDRmYTE1OWI5YmJiNTFkNGJjZjVkOTdfdDdEcmZIRWtvQ2ZrdzBqQVZKcG0yOG9ZMUl5YmdvUENfVG9rZW46SEF1WmI1QnUyb2lFQUt4V3FZUGNGM2NMbnJoXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

我选择留安南，但是打7m亏了太多牌效，这时点数仅仅领先4位100点，是绝对要以效率为重

### 前期进攻失败，两家17铳

| 牌谱链接                                                     | 终局顺位 | 当前段位        | rating | Matching          | 生成时间            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------------- | ------ | ----------------- | ------------------- |
| [前期进攻失败](https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-e8638977-1e65-464c-9c7c-1dcf8879e183_a10115437) | 2        | 雀豪3 1962/3600 | 88.333 | 136/173 = 78.613% | 2023-04-06 20:09:21 |

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjJhODNjN2Y2NWRiMzhiNTMwMzRhNjc1YWIxMGVjZmNfOHZBTG0xQVhxQkhEZWNjUkFEb25CUmhEdHhsRlBxT0hfVG9rZW46WTltM2JpUFQ5b2FxM2h4U3NId2NCS1JHblNiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

基本牌效问题，这里5p是很有用的，而且上家在做混全（很明显），所以6s会好一点

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=Zjg5YmFlNjg5YTQ2MWU4OWQ4MTk0Mjk1ZTFmZTJiMDNfbHhhYUpocHc1WkJSbGVwU3Vhc0F3dHlES1VyRVRDSzVfVG9rZW46SFl0UGI2Q3NHbzdzOVp4cm5rTWM2dWc3bnplXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

AI已经认为2p非常危险了，而且兜牌也是打6s

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDZlZTljYzMyODA2ZDU4YWQ4MjU0ZTU2OGYwN2U4NDFfdjNTcHF3TVVvZlFWcGJKYUR5b25rd0oxY3NBUEFHbFpfVG9rZW46UDRnb2JiVnpjb3ZrMzF4Q3lRTGM0dkJwbjRiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

上家亲家立直，绝对是不吃的，断幺的话后续也得冲危险张

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NTkwNWRjZjYwMjUzMTYyODhmN2E0YjQ4OWU2ZDBhYjFfNnFaYWZmSUQxT2NhdWN3ZE42Q1BuaFVXd1JFb29PSENfVG9rZW46SVp3Q2JwUDhMb2F2U1h4TjNVWmNXa0NTbjJkXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

牌效问题，1p绝对是更没用的

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MDcwZTllNjNlYWM5MDFjMGJjNDFiMTRkMmI2YTE0ZmJfck1LdTdEVWlLcnFqd1ZoejVlOU0xbXp5MEhmTGZqTU5fVG9rZW46S3JnM2JUamg1b29mb1p4QmNLVWNLSzV6bjdiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

未有立直，2s可以吃了，三色d2属于打点非常不错的牌，而且1m偏听也没有特别难受

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MTMyYTdmZTdlMTgwNmU0N2VmNmQ2M2MxNWE1MzJmZmZfNzkyQ1I0VnJldENtNkd2eHFjRm40eW82YXJ6VkFEV29fVG9rZW46V2s3N2I3dlBkb2Rpbnp4dzhSUmNYZkRKbjhGXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

对家立直，而且上家冲了6s，3s比较安全，而且还考虑到三色，故先打3s兜牌

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NmYwMDZiNDg4YjgyMWE1MmY5YTFkYzY4YTAwYjg0NjFfSlBDVGswMlNRRk1remN3VE1KSHRCTHJDaUtSUER4ZlJfVG9rZW46VWdISGI1SXFIbzlyVHd4WUV1N2NYME1MbnNiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

搭子超载，拆46m

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWI1YjliMDI5NWJkMzMwOTAwYzNmN2ZhODMxOTY1YTRfRUsxVGxTWDB2SjRKcXlGVUpkTTVVWTlVQ2Vyd3M5T09fVG9rZW46UjMxZmIxZW1Cb0Zra3F4ODVua2NZbHg1bm1mXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

下家立直，5m没过，但是AI觉得可以兜，我考虑到只有东是安全的，遂放弃吃

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzU0MzhlMjdlZjNmN2E2ZTdiZWJmOTMyMzZjZjQwNzhfNzJ1UTlBVU54dzFodDhsbE8wYTQyRUhPRWFvMGc3aVFfVG9rZW46TGo5cWJDZmtPb0MwYlV4V1NXU2NxSVB4bmxoXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

仍然维持平胡形状，1s是不合适的

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZjFmZWIyNWJkZjhmNGRjNzdlMTIxYjM3OGI5YjIwMDNfcXVUbHNxNEFUVWhUWVp4Slo3UnBNSjBjc2huSmxQVnZfVG9rZW46UmpjQmJlVk1lb09sSkl4TERiU2N3eEUzbnJlXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

这里非常的纠结，7s是dora，为了能全部利用，AI选择打8s找断幺九

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDUxNWMzZWIyYTdhOTdhYjJmM2VmZjAzMDM3M2RhM2NfSVZWRzhhdDVxN1JPQVBqYzZ3bHRzWWxvVTZ5S1pUakZfVG9rZW46Vldab2JWNUhFb1ZrMTZ4eTBSMWNHUUN6bmVnXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

6m已经没了，就先打6m

### 开局亲家立直点了满贯

| 牌谱链接                                                     | 终局顺位 | 当前段位        | rating | Matching          | 生成时间            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------------- | ------ | ----------------- | ------------------- |
| [亲家立直点满贯](https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-cbae50f0-02a3-46dd-87bc-5fa1d01d7efb_a10115437) | 3        | 雀豪3 1956/3600 | 89.271 | 127/161 = 78.882% | 2023-04-06 22:25:42 |

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2Y5MTdhOWNkZTY4MWNmYmMzMDhhMDI2NzE4MjJmMWNfWVI1WERtcWxhNVQxaXhDYldtY3ZMemVKeDY0VXpJQ05fVG9rZW46UVVRa2JVMTNnb1U3bkx4eHZpb2NSV1JobnBkXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

很糟糕的牌效问题，打2p就是最好的没有争议

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZThhZjA4MmM3YzAyYmE2NGIwOGE1NDE5YzQ1MmRmMGNfWkZMZVExU212NEU2V200WmtxNkIxSHM4TmJ2YnZJYm1fVG9rZW46VDkyMWJkRm9vb2xTTTZ4QnF2OWNBWW1ZblFiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

开局搭子不齐，2s肯定利用不太上，遂打掉

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjQ2YmQ3YmM1NDU1YzQzNTMzNjk3MThhYTZkZGFiYzBfUEgya1NycnJobFpMUTl3U2VZa0dKTXNPRGJPTll3TjNfVG9rZW46R0lhRWJLellVb2E5cUh4TjlmVmN2Wm1vbkVjXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

拆一个搭子，肯定不拆113m复合型，考虑到后续三色可能，拆68m中的8m

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZWFiZDFiNzc5YTAzOWYzZmIxMGJhMTkyMzlhMTRkM2VfRnVjRGtJaEVhRWUwbXlSRHVpS2duaXRhdVFmNW95T3dfVG9rZW46QTFFb2JVbFlTb0pSalZ4cG9CZ2Nwdkp5bnZlXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

当时觉得3s断了，2s好出；最后虽然胡到了，但是还是很逆天的，就应该继续打2pdama着，随时准备撤退或者等改良立直

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NjFmZDYyMzJlMjE5MjdmOTQxMjlkYmUwNGFmNzhmYjlfbjVQTDlVakg1dXhQcE5VNklGcUlHSWhCWGc0S2JlaExfVG9rZW46S2VnVGJIcHZqbzdIaXF4NnA4NmNLWmU2bnJnXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

亲家立直AI觉得三面可以日！

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NDQ3ZGM0MzVhNjAyZWJhODBkOGRhMThhMTEzNGJiNWFfYUJ2YWppWlhyRkNRT05aWXZSZlRCM2I5SkFaS1pRSFVfVG9rZW46Wm5wbmJxaTRjb1Vzd2N4VUFZQmM4Q3NubkNGXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

2s被碰了，严重失误！

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=NzdmZWQ3ZWM3ZGNlYmUwMzg4MWFkZWQzMGFiMjgyNDBfSTR4UU5xSkhrVHp1Z0dUQWZZZ1RDcnM4TmVVbDJHQjRfVG9rZW46RExyRWJhOGx1b25EbWN4dXl4WGMxUFZPblZmXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

当时觉得上家在染手，又是强运，不太敢冲0s；但是就该勇敢立直！

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=N2E5NTY1ZmZkOWY5ZTVkMGE1ZGVmN2ExYjVhOGNjNjNfQjI5VkdqQldaVXRJVlZxYmxyTmVHUWlyNExiOVVDSUFfVG9rZW46RDZFRmI0YUk2bzZzVm54bmdxYWNzMnpQbmFiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

AI觉得北也没有那么危险！可以日；但我觉得并不行

https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-7ec521d2-cf3a-425e-8128-96a7e4ed0c91_a10115437

## 顺风

## 僵持

### 开局有倒霉蛋和大狗

| 牌谱链接                                                     | 终局顺位 | 当前段位        | rating | Matching        | 生成时间            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------------- | ------ | --------------- | ------------------- |
| [开局有倒霉蛋和大狗](https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-7ec521d2-cf3a-425e-8128-96a7e4ed0c91_a10115437) | 3        | 雀豪3 1951/3600 | 78.017 | 17/27 = 62.963% | 2023-04-06 22:49:28 |

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ODYxMzMxOTlhYzY4MzFlMmJjNTU0NDA4NDczYjRiN2Zfc2ZWOTk0MGZENFJYNHBxT3U5emlyeWIxWTJxelVHcnNfVG9rZW46Q1UxNmJZZXlobzZRUTF4TURnR2NIOVkybkhnXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

当时觉得对家是对对，所以没敢打2m

### 战况焦灼，面对三个忍者

| 牌谱链接                                                     | 终局顺位 | 当前段位        | rating | Matching          | 生成时间            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | --------------- | ------ | ----------------- | ------------------- |
| [面对三个忍者](https://game.maj-soul.com/1/?paipu=230406-dd8f7109-9b5e-451d-aea7-abf2a31b11d2_a10115437) | 3        | 雀豪3 1950/3600 | 91.001 | 159/198 = 80.303% | 2023-04-06 23:40:50 |

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=ZmQ5MDQ5ZmFjZGEwMzI2NmExYWM4NWVhY2YxZGY0MGJfbDZIcjhQY095WG1NYllTODk3dmRBVFBwQXFNR0o3SlpfVG9rZW46RElnYWJGZUljb0JmSVF4dVBEbGNiYmFHblZiXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

还是要靠宝牌可能

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=OTg5ZDIyZjFhZTg5NjI2OTEzMGEwNGM2N2Y1OTZjZjhfSEdMdVAwWVdSV0w5c0J3dENTSEdiQk1HZXBSNlE5aWpfVG9rZW46R29zaWJ1aTRob29VTUd4N09OWmNHcEs0bmhlXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

门清兜牌更偏向

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=YmQ4NzY4M2Q3ZmFkZDQ1NWQ4NTAzNjJhOGRhNGZlMGFfNHVwTVRBU1JkRzlJN2NOMnlVRW1CcHZWN2lWVkJVSzZfVG9rZW46SHNNb2JMTnpyb3hhUEx4WDNqSmNFRnRXbkpoXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

搭子不够好，别打中张7s

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MWFjMjhhYjY0YTZkYjQwZDYzOTYxZmQ2ZTMyZTY5ZDRfTHJNTU1FTHJTYmR2dWs0RDFhbUVGbUUwMHlJOTR5SVpfVG9rZW46U1d1dmJYZWpvb2JhaW94Y0ZsRmNFdDhxbnhkXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

复合型更好一点，有很多改良！！

![img](https://lucpdckk2o.feishu.cn/space/api/box/stream/download/asynccode/?code=MjQyMmQxZjI4YjU0M2VjMDJlNGFkNmJiYjU1MGE5NzJfY0liTjJnbG40Z3JDZHRTTVliY1B5QkhOVkRxZXNucDRfVG9rZW46Smh1bGJSM1ZUb0oyVGF4dzgxZmNlYjdybm1HXzE2ODA4NzkwNDg6MTY4MDg4MjY0OF9WNA)

这里AI给出的是吃，我觉得是很有道理的

玩家：6m

AI：西

这里AI认为应该打西，确实应该打西，拆两个西后续还有兜牌的可能

这里我认为dora2想留着役牌快速听牌；但是AI可能觉得断幺九要更好一点，得反省一下，确实摸8p也同样可以碰听，断幺九会更优秀一点

这里AI同样重视断幺九，而且打掉4m亏了太多改良，就算后面听了形状也很差，打点也不高，所以打1s

仍然维持平胡形状，1s是不合适的
